plot: Three out of work friends decide to take a page from the MTV generation and pull off pranks and stunts to impress friends and family. Usually ending in a trip to the hospital or a very serious infection.
plot_en: Three out of work friends decide to take a page from the MTV generation and pull off pranks and stunts to impress friends and family. Usually ending in a trip to the hospital or a very serious infection.
plot_es: Three out of work friends decide to take a page from the MTV generation and pull off pranks and stunts to impress friends and family. Usually ending in a trip to the hospital or a very serious infection.
title: JIT Shorts
